name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Historical Documents
A netizen posted a photo of the Guangzhou Daily in 2004. The front page of that day read "China never encourages the industrialization of education"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 5 (Released), Guangzhou. Another food delivery man collapsed while delivering an order.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 5, another suspected third-generation red was exposed for showing off his wealth online.
The reason was that an account named "Dong Dong An An" said in a comment area that "my grandmother gave me 180 million yuan for my 20th birthday." This aroused the curiosity of many netizens.
Netizens tracked his multiple social media and found that he not only showed off luxury cars and huge deposits, but also the State Council appointment letters of his family members, his grandmother's collection, and several photos related to the founding marshal Zhu De.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the foreign language learning website "Preply" announced the ranking list of "The 20 Most Friendly Cities in Asia in 2024". Taipei beat other major Asian cities and won the first place in the "Friendliest City". Singapore ranked second; Delhi in India ranked third; and Hong Kong ranked 16th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 3, a student reported to the Education Bureau of Suining County, Xuzhou, Jiangsu Province, that the school charged for extra classes. The student was repeatedly angrily criticized by the Education Bureau staff and was asked to recite the text, which attracted the attention of netizens. On the 4th, the Xuzhou Municipal Education Bureau responded to the reporter of Huashang Daily Dafeng News that it would strengthen the management of on-duty staff.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 4, Xinyang, Henan. In Gudui Township, Huaibin County, the groom had already paid 188,000 yuan for the betrothal gift. On the wedding day, the bride's brother and sister-in-law asked the groom for another 180,000 yuan for the betrothal gift. After a dispute between the two sides, the bride was forced to prepare to jump off the building twice. The groom had no choice but to take the bride away by force. The video shows that the bride and groom ran to the wedding car to leave, and a man lay on the front of the car to prevent them from leaving. Many people around tried to dissuade them. On October 5, the staff of the Gudui Township Police Station in the jurisdiction said that they knew about the incident and were handling it. The bride had been picked up by the groom.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens dug up an old news article that was published one month before the release of "I Opened a Supermarket on the Long March". The China Economic Net official account announced that "I Opened a Supermarket in Ancient Times" was removed from the entire network due to its vulgar and indecent content.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Really Free Tea: On October 1, the Hongxing Street Service Station and the Xijie Community Service Station of the Public Security Bureau of Dazu District, Chongqing, were officially put into operation. In order to carry out anti-fraud publicity to citizens, the service stations provided free "anti-fraud" tea. There are a wide variety of tea drinks, including American, latte, cappuccino, Sterculia lychnophora chrysanthemum tea, red dates, longan and wolfberry tea, etc., which attracted a large number of citizens to line up to experience and participate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 4, EU member states voted to approve the imposition of tariffs on electric vehicles imported from China. Ten member states, including France and Italy, voted in favor, 12 member states abstained, and five member states (Germany, Hungary, Malta, Slovenia, and Slovakia) voted against.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In response, the Chinese Ministry of Commerce stated on the same day that the EU's imposition of high tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles will shake and hinder the confidence and determination of Chinese companies to invest and cooperate in Europe; the new media "Yuyuan Tantian" under the Chinese official media also issued a warning that if EU member states support the imposition of taxation, they will lose Chinese investment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: WuXi AppTec and WuXi Biologics are exploring the sale of some of their pharmaceutical businesses, according to a Financial Times report. The sale is said to be taking place against the backdrop of the upcoming US Biosafety Act, which would prohibit drugmakers contracted by the US government from using the services of the two companies after 2032.
